TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Ya-ma-sin-i-lin, title = Ya-ma-sin-i-lin, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ya-ma-sin-i-lin} }

S.FORM: == kakiliman == Ya-ma-sin-i-lin "Pu-taw-ya a kamu, Amazônia, Si-pan-ya a kamu, Amazonia" singangnan aca tu Ya-ma-sin-i-lin, tini i Nan-mey-cow Ya-ma-sun-pen-tiay nu akuti'ay nu siudaay a buyu', picalap nu lala' pakala tu 500 emang pin-bang kuli dada' uyni a sakauzip a buyu' uyza u Ya-ma-sin a sauwac. yadahay a buyu' mibalat miawas tu walu a kanatalan, Pasi "micalap tu kilakilangan payhun 60% ku hekal". zuma sepat a kanatalan ku yadahay udad a buyu' tungusay u cow pangangan han Ya-ma-sin-cow. Ya-ma-sin-i-lin u heka malatusa nu kitakit, hekal nu kilakilangan payhun 21%, u satabakiay nu ticiw atu yadahay aadupan atu mulangaway nu yadahay udad nu akuti'ay a buyu'. maletek ku kilakilangan 森林砍伐 macapi tu payhun lima tu cacay a Ya-ma-sin-i-lin mapeci tu, zuma a uliwan mahiza tu musuayaw tu kalihalawan. i 1990 a mihcaan katukuh 2000 a nihcaasn 10 a mihcaan kaapuyu' nu demiad, Ya-ma-sin-i-lin mapeci'ay a hekal makay 4,150 emang kung-cin macakat katukuh 5,870 emang kung-cin lecaday tu Pu-taw-yaay tu tusa kaahebal nu hekal. angangan lalekalan malukay nu Pa-si a yadah ku nilacu saahebal sa miletek tu yadaay a udad abuyu' paluma' tu kumuh atu sasimalan a cung. "sisimal ku cowng-li" i 2004 a mihcaa 7 a bulad a katatengilan, kesey paayaw tu yadahay udad a buyu' a caay tu kahiza nu ayaway tu paymihcaan masulup ku lasubu emang kun-tun ku labuay a akuti nu bali, lalekalan mangaleb ku kalamkam ku nikapeci' nu yadaay udad a buyu'. uyni 2003 a mihcaan dada', izaw ku 9,169 pin-bang inb-li ku maletekay tu a kilang. 於2004年7 . i Pa-siay dada', macaliway tu 90 ku niyazu' nu Yincumincu i 1900 a ziday malawpes nu imelang atu nikalalais, pinaay tu a mihcaan ku nikasuped sakay yadaay udad a buyu' mauzipay aadupan u tineng aca nu isingay malasawad tu. uyni a lala' lalid sa maletek ku kilakilangan mapeci' tu atu masibek tu mapatay ku mulangawa mauzipay, tinaku u Mi-lu Ya-ma-sin, tiniay a Yincumincu haymaw satu mahedaw. . 2023 a mkihca 6 a bulad 5 ademiad, Pa-si a Cung-tung ci Lu-la pangangan tu nisulitan, panutekan i 2030 a mihcaan katukuh Ya-ma-sin-i-lin "inayi' tu ku miletekay" anu pina ku niletekan ahatiza ku nipaluma tu kilang. 2023年6月5日, . kikasumad nu demiad malilid tu ku Ya-ma-sin-i-lin izaw tahkal ku nisulitanYa-ma-sin-i-lin mulangaway iayaw 210,000 a mihcaan, milihiza tu sazikuzay tu nu kuliamim a mihcaan atu kalananuman a mihcaan "deglaciation", tabaki ku nikasumad. namasaheci tu ku kitizaan nu Ya-ma-sin ku-bu "paleolake" atu ku nikasaupu nu maleneknek a tuud, tahkal ku nasulitan sazikuzay a kulian a mihcaan maselep ku udad kikaadidi'an tu nu ayzaan. mahiniay kanca taneng amin zayhan masatancunay a lala' masuemet ku akuti'ay u nikaselep nu lutuk. itawya ahebal ku nikaselep nu lutuk, ke-sye-cya caay kalecad ku nipisakamu. hiniasa ku zuma a ke-sye-cya adidi' tu ku i-lin zuma caay tu kayadah atu kalaliyas nu tanengay a siwawa a kitizaan "refugium", mapalaed nu ahebalay akilakilangan atu nalinabuwan, hinisa ku ke-sya-cya mahizaay tu ku i-lin, uyza u nuamisan, nuwalian atu nutimulan caay kanayat katukuh tu nu ayzaay a kabatud. 005 a mihcaan, Ya-ma-sin milihiza tu 100 a mihcaan tu pihacengay a kakelad, lalid tu sakatusa a mihcaan nu kakedal. 2006 a mihca 7 a bulad 23 a demiad , I-ng-kow pasakamu i wangcan, Lin-tung migingkiway a cungsin "Woods Hole Research Center" patahal tu pulung a kawaw, uyza u kayadah ku liletekan tu kilang, sisa makedal tu ku Ya-ma-sin, kalamkam a hamin nu kakitizaan micuzuh pasayza i "nikasumad" "Ing a kamu, "tipping point" anu yadahay udad a buyu' amanukas tu malingatu mapatay. kilakilangan i tapiingan tu nu likelikenan, sakay hamin nu ti-ciw malilid nu demiad a masatubuc. Hhkay a malawpes ku kitakit. . pihaceng ku kaliid嚴重影響 makay 2019 a mihcaan malingatu, Ya-ma-sin yadahay udad zayhan macaliway tu ku niletekan, nu hekalay, kikasumad nu demiad a kawaw tultultul sa a matuduh, katukuh 2019 a mihca 8 a bulad, Ya-ma-sin-i-lin i 8 a bulad tu cayay katanayu'a demiad pakal tu 4 emang ku nikatuduh, palalecad tuyza a mihcaan tu 2018 a mihcaan macunus tu ku 77% pasen. A-mey-lika a kanatal pulung nu pahikukiay "NASA" patahkal tu pinaay i 8 a bulad nisasing nu wiy-sin tahkal ku nisasingan,Lang-tu -ni-ya-cow atu Ya-ma-sin-cow zayhan namakatuduh tu nu wacah satu ku tapuku, uyni a wacah i pabaw nu Ya-ma-sin a sauwac masacacayay a salining, i Pa-si kasakitizaan mulalad, tuwaca laed tu Lang-towni-ya-cow 2200 kung-liay a Sin-paw-low a ktizaan, malilid tu nu waca a nikatuduh nu kilakilangan, mahetik ku "lumeni'ay a udad", u nipatatenga' i udad izaw ku nisuped tu masaatiladay a nikatuduhan. i-lin namatuduh tiniay i yadahay udad a buyu' nu muenengay aadupan yadah ku mapatayay. ayzaay katukuh tu tulu a lalipayan a nikatuduh caay edapen nu tiniay Pa-siay a tademaw, yu matineng tuyni a kawaw ku kitakitay zikuz, Pa-si cong-tung ci Ya-i-al·Poe-su-na-low makaynah tu, Ow-COW a binawlan amin sabeleng satu tazazan musakamu tu Pa-si a pipadeng tu lamal, , Ya-i-al·Pow-su-na-low-i zayhan Ba-kow cung-tung ci Ma-ke-hung paewang i G7 satabakiay a kaygian a palaayaw matatengil tu nikatuduh nu Ya-ma-sin uyni kacenuhan a kawaw atu u silaeday masasukaynah, Ya-i-al·Pow-su-na-low hinisa "milihizaay tu kawaw nu Pa-si" atu hinisa "caay pabeli tu kalisie a miedap tu katuudh ku Pa-si". satu Ya-i-al·Pow-su-na-low-I penecen tu cin-ciw kya paculcul tu hitay papipaneng tu lamal. zuma a kanatal malingatu tu sida'it ku tademaw amin u liyuh nu Pa-si a cen-hu atu Ya-ma-sin-i-lin anuayaw a kalihanawan. uyni tabakiay a nikatuduh mabuhat tu ku nuayaway nu Ya-ma-sin-i-lin ahebal ku nikacunus tu niletekan atu Ya-i-al·Pow-su-na-low-I tu kalungad nu i-lin a kungku. u matuayay nu Pow-su-na-low caay kaaku sa pakalingestu tu Pa-si a kanatal tay-kung migingkiway a yen-cang ci Li-ka-tow·cya-al-wang "Ricardo Galvao", malingatu tu masasukaynah a tatusa. zikuz Pow-su-na-low i pipenec nu kasakitakit hawsa pasakamu tu hamin nu kanatal i 60 a demiad lacus a tuduhen ku kilang tu pilisimet tu sakalukan a lala'. (Ricardo Galvao)反擊, . malalitin tu i hekalay atu zumaay a natinengan

== kakiliman == Ya-ma-sin-i-lin "Po-taw-ya a kamo, Amazônia, Si-pan-ya a kamo, Amazonia" singangnan aca to Ya-ma-sin-i-lin, tini i Nan-mey-cow Ya-ma-son-pen-tiay no akoti'ay no siodaay a boyo', picalap no lala' pakala to 500 emang pin-bang koli dada' oyni a sakaozip a boyo' oyza o Ya-ma-sin a saowac. yadahay a boyo' mibalat miawas to walo a kanatalan, Pasi "micalap to kilakilangan payhon 60% ko hekal". zoma sepat a kanatalan ko yadahay odad a boyo' tongosay o cow pangangan han Ya-ma-sin-cow. Ya-ma-sin-i-lin o heka malatosa no kitakit, hekal no kilakilangan payhon 21%, o satabakiay no ticiw ato yadahay aadopan ato molangaway no yadahay odad no akoti'ay a boyo'. maletek ko kilakilangan 森林砍伐 macapi to payhon lima to cacay a Ya-ma-sin-i-lin mapeci to, zoma a oliwan mahiza to mosoayaw to kalihalawan. i 1990 a mihcaan katokoh 2000 a nihcaasn 10 a mihcaan kaapoyo' no demiad, Ya-ma-sin-i-lin mapeci'ay a hekal makay 4,150 emang kong-cin macakat katokoh 5,870 emang kong-cin lecaday to Po-taw-yaay to tosa kaahebal no hekal. angangan lalekalan malokay no Pa-si a yadah ko nilaco saahebal sa miletek to yadaay a odad aboyo' paloma' to komoh ato sasimalan a cong. "sisimal ko cowng-li" i 2004 a mihcaa 7 a bolad a katatengilan, kesey paayaw to yadahay odad a boyo' a caay to kahiza no ayaway to paymihcaan masolop ko lasobo emang kon-ton ko laboay a akoti no bali, lalekalan mangaleb ko kalamkam ko nikapeci' no yadaay odad a boyo'. oyni 2003 a mihcaan dada', izaw ko 9,169 pin-bang inb-li ko maletekay to a kilang. 於2004年7 . i Pa-siay dada', macaliway to 90 ko niyazo' no Yincominco i 1900 a ziday malawpes no imelang ato nikalalais, pinaay to a mihcaan ko nikasoped sakay yadaay odad a boyo' maozipay aadopan o tineng aca no isingay malasawad to. oyni a lala' lalid sa maletek ko kilakilangan mapeci' to ato masibek to mapatay ko molangawa maozipay, tinako o Mi-lo Ya-ma-sin, tiniay a Yincominco haymaw sato mahedaw. . 2023 a mkihca 6 a bolad 5 ademiad, Pa-si a Cong-tong ci Lo-la pangangan to nisolitan, panotekan i 2030 a mihcaan katokoh Ya-ma-sin-i-lin "inayi' to ko miletekay" ano pina ko niletekan ahatiza ko nipaloma to kilang. 2023年6月5日, . kikasomad no demiad malilid to ko Ya-ma-sin-i-lin izaw tahkal ko nisolitanYa-ma-sin-i-lin molangaway iayaw 210,000 a mihcaan, milihiza to sazikozay to no koliamim a mihcaan ato kalananoman a mihcaan "deglaciation", tabaki ko nikasomad. namasaheci to ko kitizaan no Ya-ma-sin ko-bo "paleolake" ato ko nikasaopo no maleneknek a tood, tahkal ko nasolitan sazikozay a kolian a mihcaan maselep ko odad kikaadidi'an to no ayzaan. mahiniay kanca taneng amin zayhan masatanconay a lala' masoemet ko akoti'ay o nikaselep no lotok. itawya ahebal ko nikaselep no lotok, ke-sye-cya caay kalecad ko nipisakamo. hiniasa ko zoma a ke-sye-cya adidi' to ko i-lin zoma caay to kayadah ato kalaliyas no tanengay a siwawa a kitizaan "refogiom", mapalaed no ahebalay akilakilangan ato nalinabowan, hinisa ko ke-sya-cya mahizaay to ko i-lin, oyza o noamisan, nowalian ato notimolan caay kanayat katokoh to no ayzaay a kabatod. 005 a mihcaan, Ya-ma-sin milihiza to 100 a mihcaan to pihacengay a kakelad, lalid to sakatosa a mihcaan no kakedal. 2006 a mihca 7 a bolad 23 a demiad , I-ng-kow pasakamo i wangcan, Lin-tong migingkiway a congsin "Woods Hole Research Center" patahal to polong a kawaw, oyza o kayadah ko liletekan to kilang, sisa makedal to ko Ya-ma-sin, kalamkam a hamin no kakitizaan micozoh pasayza i "nikasomad" "Ing a kamo, "tipping point" ano yadahay odad a boyo' amanokas to malingato mapatay. kilakilangan i tapiingan to no likelikenan, sakay hamin no ti-ciw malilid no demiad a masatoboc. Hhkay a malawpes ko kitakit. . pihaceng ko kaliid嚴重影響 makay 2019 a mihcaan malingato, Ya-ma-sin yadahay odad zayhan macaliway to ko niletekan, no hekalay, kikasomad no demiad a kawaw toltoltol sa a matodoh, katokoh 2019 a mihca 8 a bolad, Ya-ma-sin-i-lin i 8 a bolad to cayay katanayo'a demiad pakal to 4 emang ko nikatodoh, palalecad toyza a mihcaan to 2018 a mihcaan maconos to ko 77% pasen. A-mey-lika a kanatal polong no pahikokiay "NASA" patahkal to pinaay i 8 a bolad nisasing no wiy-sin tahkal ko nisasingan,Lang-to -ni-ya-cow ato Ya-ma-sin-cow zayhan namakatodoh to no wacah sato ko tapoko, oyni a wacah i pabaw no Ya-ma-sin a saowac masacacayay a salining, i Pa-si kasakitizaan molalad, towaca laed to Lang-towni-ya-cow 2200 kong-liay a Sin-paw-low a ktizaan, malilid to no waca a nikatodoh no kilakilangan, mahetik ko "lomeni'ay a odad", o nipatatenga' i odad izaw ko nisoped to masaatiladay a nikatodohan. i-lin namatodoh tiniay i yadahay odad a boyo' no moenengay aadopan yadah ko mapatayay. ayzaay katokoh to tolo a lalipayan a nikatodoh caay edapen no tiniay Pa-siay a tademaw, yo matineng toyni a kawaw ko kitakitay zikoz, Pa-si cong-tong ci Ya-i-al·Poe-so-na-low makaynah to, Ow-COW a binawlan amin sabeleng sato tazazan mosakamo to Pa-si a pipadeng to lamal, , Ya-i-al·Pow-so-na-low-i zayhan Ba-kow cong-tong ci Ma-ke-hong paewang i G7 satabakiay a kaygian a palaayaw matatengil to nikatodoh no Ya-ma-sin oyni kacenohan a kawaw ato o silaeday masasokaynah, Ya-i-al·Pow-so-na-low hinisa "milihizaay to kawaw no Pa-si" ato hinisa "caay pabeli to kalisie a miedap to katoodh ko Pa-si". sato Ya-i-al·Pow-so-na-low-I penecen to cin-ciw kya pacolcol to hitay papipaneng to lamal. zoma a kanatal malingato to sida'it ko tademaw amin o liyoh no Pa-si a cen-ho ato Ya-ma-sin-i-lin anoayaw a kalihanawan. oyni tabakiay a nikatodoh mabohat to ko noayaway no Ya-ma-sin-i-lin ahebal ko nikaconos to niletekan ato Ya-i-al·Pow-so-na-low-I to kalongad no i-lin a kongko. o matoayay no Pow-so-na-low caay kaako sa pakalingesto to Pa-si a kanatal tay-kong migingkiway a yen-cang ci Li-ka-tow·cya-al-wang "Ricardo Galvao", malingato to masasokaynah a tatosa. zikoz Pow-so-na-low i pipenec no kasakitakit hawsa pasakamo to hamin no kanatal i 60 a demiad lacos a todohen ko kilang to pilisimet to sakalokan a lala'. (Ricardo Galvao)反擊, . malalitin to i hekalay ato zomaay a natinengan
